name: Uproot (BluebsTopCat)
description:
Race against the clock to grow a giant beanstalk!

================

Uproot is a pixel art platformer made in two weeks! Grow your vine as tall as possible before time runs out, and watch it bloom!

==============
CONTROLS

WASD, UDLR - Move

W/U/SPACE - Jump

J - Grab

==============
CREDITS

Art, Programming, Level Design - BluebsTopCat @bluebscat

Music - Harriet Ford Music @hfordmusic

Sound Effects - Zapsplat.com

WARNING: The mac build isn't tested, so it may not work.
